page.title: 07A JOINER FROM CRADLEY
page.content: He has lived in Cradley for most of his life.He said "Cradley has changed a lot.There are housing estates and wider roads." He enjoys living in Cradley because it is a beautiful place.He doesn't know if he'll ever leave Cradley.He drives a car and he thinks the roads are safe but it would be better if there was a speed limit through Cradley.In his spare time he likes reading and gardening.He likes reading nature and history.He likes spending his holidays by the sea but doesn't like going abroad.He doesn't like eating out and his favourite foods are beef and potatoes.He likes walking on the footpaths.He gets most happiness from the sun.His hopes for the future are worldwide peace.
